sdkStorage.title: Storage API
sdkStorage.subtitle: Simple key-value storage for settings and preferences.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: The Storage API provides a simple key-value store scoped to your extension. It's perfect for settings, preferences, and simple data that doesn't need the complexity of a database.
overview.note: Storage data is scoped to your extension and persists across sessions.

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.intro: Get, set, and remove values with simple async methods:

jsonData.title: Storing JSON Data
jsonData.intro: Storage values are strings. Serialize complex data with JSON:
jsonData.warning: Remember to handle JSON.parse errors for corrupted or invalid data.

examples.title: Examples
examples.settingsDesc: A reusable composable for managing application settings:
